Source code for add_subtract


[docs]
def add(a, b):
    """
    Add two numbers.

    Parameters
    ----------
    a : float
        The first number.
    b : float
        The second number.

    Returns
    -------
    float
        The sum of the two numbers.

    Examples
    --------
    >>> add(2, 3)
    5
    """
    return a + b






[docs]
def subtract(a, b):
    """
    Subtract one number from another.

    Parameters
    ----------
    a : float
        The number to subtract from.
    b : float
        The number to subtract.

    Returns
    -------
    float
        The result of the subtraction.

    Examples
    --------
    >>> subtract(5, 3)
    2
    """
    return a - b
